name: Snivy

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.

name: Tepig

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: It blows fire through its nose. When it catches a cold, the fire becomes pitch-black smoke instead.

name: Oshawott

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

flavorText: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

name: Reshiram

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blue Flare
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.

name: Zekrom

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bolt Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 40 damage to itself.

flavorText: This Pokémon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.

name: Snivy

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.

name: Tepig

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Firebreathing
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

flavorText: It can deftly dodge its foe's attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.

name: Oshawott

attacks.name: Sleep Pulse
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: The scalchop on its stomach is made from the same elements as claws. It detaches the scalchop for use as a blade.

name: Zoroark

attacks.name: Nasty Plot
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Foul Play
attacks.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

flavorText: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.

name: Axew

attacks.name: Dragon Rage
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

name: Pansage

attacks.name: Bullet Seed
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are know to relieve stress.

name: Zorua

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

flavorText: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.

name: Minccino
flavorText: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.

name: Pansage

attacks.name: Bullet Seed
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.

name: Pidove
flavorText: Each follows its Trainer's orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.

name: Axew

attacks.name: Dragon Rage
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

name: Ducklett
flavorText: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

name: Darumaka

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

flavorText: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.

name: Zoroark

attacks.name: Punishment
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Stage 2 Pokémon, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Snarl
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

name: Serperior

abilities.name: Royal Heal
abilities.text: At any times between turns, heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leaf Tornado
attacks.text: Move as many Grass Energy attached to your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.

flavorText: They raise their heads to intimidate opponents but only give their all when fighting a powerful opponent.

name: Emboar

abilities.name: Inferno Fandango
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

flavorText: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

name: Samurott

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.text: Any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: Part of the armor on its anterior legs becomes a giant sword. Its cry alone is enough to intimidate most enemies.

name: Reshiram

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blue Flare
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.

name: Zekrom

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bolt Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 40 damage to itself.

flavorText: This Pokémon appears in legends. In its tail, it has a giant generator that creates electricity.

name: Scraggy

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: It immediately headbutts anyone that makes eye contact with it. Its skull is massively thick.

name: Axew

attacks.name: Big Bite
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

flavorText: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.

name: Litwick

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

flavorText: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

name: Tropical Beach
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may draw cards until he or she has 7 cards in his or her hand. If he or she does, that player's turn ends.
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.

name: Victory Cup
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

name: Victory Cup
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

name: Victory Cup
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

name: Victini

abilities.name: Victory Star
abilities.text: Once during your turn, after you flip any coins for an attack, you may ignore all effects of those coin flips and begin flipping those coins again. You can't use more than 1 Victory Star Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Stored Power
attacks.text: Move all Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

flavorText: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

name: Riolu

attacks.name: Run Around
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

flavorText: It has the peculiar power of being able to see emotions such as joy and rage in the form of waves.

name: Luxio

attacks.name: Dazzle Blast
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Random Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

name: Meowth

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

flavorText: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.

name: Reshiram-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Glinting Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Brave Fire
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon does 50 damage to itself.

name: Kyurem-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Frozen Wings
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hail Blizzard
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Hail Blizzard during your next turn.

name: Zekrom-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Glinting Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Strong Volt
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Battle City
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may flip a coin. If heads, the player draws a card.
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.

name: Volcarona

abilities.name: Scorching Scales
abilities.text: Put 4 damage counters instead of 2 on your opponent's Burned Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Burning Wind
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

flavorText: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

name: Thundurus

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Disaster Volt
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.

name: Tornadus

attacks.name: Energy Wheel
attacks.text: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hurricane
attacks.text: Move a basic Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

flavorText: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

name: Landorus

attacks.name: Abundant Harvest
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gaia Hammer
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."

name: Kyurem

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Glaciate
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: It generates powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

name: Mewtwo-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: X Ball
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokémon and the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psydrive
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Darkrai-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Dark Cloak
abilities.text: Each of your Pokémon that has any Darkness Energy attached to it has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Night Spear
attacks.text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Rayquaza-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Celestial Roar
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon Burst
attacks.text: Discard all basic Fire Energy or all basic Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage times the number of Energy you discarded.

name: Altaria

abilities.name: Fight Song
abilities.text: Your Dragon Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop the friend with its soft wings, then hum.

name: Lilligant

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Dream Dance
attacks.text: Both this Pokémon and the Defending Pokémon are now Asleep.

flavorText: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.

name: Tropical Beach
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may draw cards until he or she has 7 cards in his or her hand. If he or she does, that player's turn ends.
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.

name: Crobat

abilities.name: Night Sight
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.

attacks.name: Ultra-Toxic Fang
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

flavorText: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.

name: Lillipup

attacks.name: Knock Away
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

flavorText: It faces strong opponents with great courage. But, when at a disadvantage in a fight, this intelligent Pokémon flees.

name: Flygon

abilities.name: Sand Slammer
abilities.text: At any time between turns, if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flying Beatdown
attacks.text: You may discard a Grass Energy and a Fighting Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: Known as "The Desert Spirit," this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.

name: Pikachu

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

flavorText: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.

name: Elgyem

abilities.name: Weak Barrier
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any Psychic Energy attached to it, this Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Quick Blow
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

flavorText: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.

name: Empoleon

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Cold Crush
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

flavorText: If anyone were to hurt its pride, it would slash them with wings that can cleave through an ice floe.

name: Haxorus

attacks.name: Armor Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Dual Chop
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.

name: Black Kyurem

attacks.name: Dual Claw
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Flash Freeze
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

name: White Kyurem

attacks.name: Damage Rush
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Cold Fire
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

flavorText: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

name: Keldeo

attacks.name: Swords Dance
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Aqua Blade attack's base damage is 120.

flavorText: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.

name: Keldeo-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Rush In
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch this Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Secret Sword
attacks.text: Does 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Black Kyurem-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Dragon Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Freeze Shock
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

name: White Kyurem-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Dragon Stream
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ice Burn
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Drifblim

attacks.name: Shadow Steal
attacks.text: Does 50 damage times the number of Special Energy cards in your opponent's discard pile.

attacks.name: Plentiful Placement
attacks.text: Put 4 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

flavorText: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. When noticed, they suddenly vanish.

name: Jigglypuff

attacks.name: Continuous Tumble
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.

name: Ninetales

abilities.name: Bright Look
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hexed Flame
attacks.text: Does 50 more damage for each Special Condition affecting the Defending Pokémon.

flavorText: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.

name: Ampharos

attacks.name: Random Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Electricannon
attacks.text: You may discard all Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 60 more damage.

flavorText: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the tail's light.

name: Meloetta

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

flavorText: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

name: Meloetta

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

flavorText: Many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays.

name: Virizion

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.text: Each of this Pokémon's attacks does 50 more damage to Darkness Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Leaf Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

flavorText: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.

name: Terrakion

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.text: Each of this Pokémon's attacks does 50 more damage to Darkness Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Crushing Blow
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

flavorText: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

name: Cobalion

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.text: Each of this Pokémon's attack does 50 more damage to Darkness Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Iron Head
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

flavorText: This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.

name: Darkrai

attacks.name: Hide in Shadows
attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Hole
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

flavorText: To protect itself, it afflicts those around it with nightmares. However, it means no harm.

name: Giratina

attacks.name: Hex
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Shadow Claw
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

flavorText: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

name: Metagross

abilities.name: Plasma Search
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Team Plasma card, reveal it, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. You may not use an Ability with the same name during your turn.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

flavorText: With four linked brains, it's more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.

name: Electrode

attacks.name: Electribeam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Self Destruct
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 100 damage to itself.

flavorText: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.

name: Pikachu

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.

name: Raichu

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Thunder Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

name: Landorus

attacks.name: Extrasensory
attacks.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Rock Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

flavorText: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

name: Druddigon

attacks.name: Taunt
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Boost Claw
attacks.text: During your next turn, each of this Pokémon's attacks does 30 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: It runs through the narrow tunnels formed by Excadrill and Onix. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.

name: Thundurus-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Raiden Knuckle
attacks.text: Attach an Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Team Plasma Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunderous Noise
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Plasma Energy attached to it, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Deoxys-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Power Connect
abilities.text: Your Team Plasma Pokémon's attacks (excluding Deoxys-EX) do 10 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Helix Force
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Plasma Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Lugia-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Overflow
abilities.text: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack of this Pokémon, take 1 more Prize card.

attacks.name: Plasma Gale
attacks.text: Discard a Plasma Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you can't discard a Plasma Energy, this attack does nothing.

name: Porygon-Z

abilities.name: Plasma Transfer
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Plasma Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tri Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: Its programming was modified to enable work in alien dimensions. It did not work as planned.

name: Lucario

abilities.name: Intuition
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Fast Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

flavorText: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.

name: Genesect

attacks.name: Signal Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Overdrive Smash
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overdrive Smash attack does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: Leafeon

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

flavorText: It basically does not fight. With cells similar to those of plants, it can perform photosynthesis.

name: Flareon

attacks.name: Sand-Attack
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Fire Slash
attacks.text: You may discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 30 more damage.

flavorText: Inhaled air is heated in the flame sac in its body to an intense fire over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Vaporeon

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.text: Recover 20 damage from this Pokémon.

flavorText: Its cell composition is similar to water molecules. As a result, it can melt away into water.

name: Glaceon

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

flavorText: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.

name: Jolteon

attacks.name: Electrigun
attacks.text: You may discard a Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: If agitated, it uses electricity to straighten out its fur and launch it in small bunches.

name: Espeon

abilities.name: Solar Revelation
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to each of your Pokémon that has any Energy attached to it.

attacks.name: Psy Report
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

flavorText: Its fur is so sensitive, it can sense minute shifts in the air and predict the weather.

name: Umbreon

attacks.name: Shadow Drain
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.

flavorText: When exposed to the moon's aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it gains a mysterious power.

name: Eevee

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

flavorText: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokémon conceals many different possible evolutions.

name: Champions Festival
rules: Once during each player's turn, if that player has 6 Pokémon in play, he or she may heal 10 damage from each of his or her Pokémon.
This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card.

name: Tornadus-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Blow Through
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: Eevee

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

flavorText: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokémon conceals many different possible evolutions.

name: Mew

abilities.name: Psyscan
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may have your opponent reveal his or her hand.

attacks.name: Psychic Exchange
attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 6 cards.

flavorText: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.

name: Genesect

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Breaker Bazooka
attacks.text: Discard all Grass Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: N
rules: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws a card for each of his or her remaining Prize cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

name: Genesect

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Breaker Bazooka
attacks.text: Discard all Grass Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
